description.p: Plots makes it easy to visualise mathematical formulae. In addition to basic arithmetic operations, it supports trigonometric, hyperbolic, exponential and logarithmic functions, as well as arbitrary sums and products. It can display polar equations, and both implicit and explicit Cartesian equations.
Plots is designed to integrate well with the GNOME desktop and takes advantage of modern hardware using OpenGL.

Gráfico facilita la visualización de fórmulas matemáticas. Además de las operaciones aritméticas básicas, admite funciones trigonométricas, hiperbólicas, exponenciales y logarítmicas, así como sumas y productos arbitrarios. Puede mostrar ecuaciones polares y ecuaciones cartesianas implícitas y explícitas.
Gráfico está diseñado para integrarse bien con el escritorio GNOME y aprovecha el hardware moderno usando OpenGL.

نمودارها، دیداری کردن فرمول‌های ریاضیاتی را ساده می‌کند. علاوه بر عملگرهای حسابیِ ساده، از توابع مثلثاتی، هذلولی، نمایی و لگاریتمی، و همچنین حاصل‌جمع‌ها و حاصل‌ضرب‌های سفارشی نیز پشتیبانی می‌کند. می‌تواند معادلات متقارن، و جفت معادلات ضمنی و صریح دکارتی را نمایش دهد.
نمودارها ساخته شده تا به‌خوبی با میزکار گنوم یک‌پارچه شود و با استفاده از OpenGL از سخت‌افزار نوین بهره ببرد.

Plots permet de visualiser facilement des formules mathémathiques. En plus des opérations arithmétiques de base, il prend en charge les fonctions trigonométriques, hyperboliques, exponentielles et logarithmiques, ainsi que les sommes et produits arbitraires. Il peut afficher des equations polaires et des equations cartésiennes, implicites et explicites.
Plots est conçu pour bien s'intégrer au bureau GNOME et exploite le matériel moderne en utilisant OpenGL.

Program Grafikoni olakšava vizualizaciju matematičkih formula. Osim osnovnih aritmetičkih operacija, podržava trigonometrijske, hiperboličke, eksponencijalne i logaritamske funkcije, kao i proizvoljne zbrojeve i umnoške. Može prikazati polarne jednadžbe, te implicitne i eksplicitne kartezijanske jednadžbe.
Program Grafikoni izrađen je na način da se dobro integrira u GNOME okruženje te koristi prednosti modernog hardvera pomoću OpenGL-a.

Ábrák megkönnyíti a matematikai képletek megjelenítését. Az alapvető számtani műveletek mellett támogatja a trigonometriai, hiperbolikus, exponenciális és logaritmikus függvényeket, valamint tetszőleges összegeket és szorzatokat. Poláris egyenleteket, valamint implicit és explicit derékszögű egyenleteket is megjeleníthet.
Tervezték az Ábrák, hogy jól illeszkedjen a GNOME asztalhoz, és kihasználja az OpenGL-t használó modern hardverek előnyeit.

Grafici rende facile la visulizzazione di formule matematiche. Assieme alle operazioni aritmetiche di base, ha il supporto delle funzioni trigonometriche, iperboliche, esponenziali e logaritmiche, oltre a somme e prodotti arbitrari. Può mostrare equazioni polari ed equazioni cartesiane esplicie e implicite.
Grafici è stato progettato per integrarsi perfettamente con l'ambiente desktop GNOME e sfrutta l'uso di hardware moderno usando OpenGL.

Plots maakt het eenvoudig om wiskundige formules te visualiseren. Naast de rekenkundige basisbewerkingen, ondersteunt het trigonometrische, hyperbolische, exponentiële en logaritmische functies, evenals willekeurige sommen en producten. Het kan polaire vergelijkingen en zowel impliciete als expliciete cartesiaanse vergelijkingen weergeven.
Plots is ontworpen om goed te integreren met Gnome en maakt gebruik van van moderne hardware via OpenGL.

Grafer gör det enkelt att visualisera matematiska formler. Förutom aritmetiken grundläggande operationer, det stödjer trigonometriska, hyperboliska, exponentiella och logaritmiska funktioner, samt godtyckliga summor och produkter. Det kan vara polärt ekvationer och visar både implicita och explicita kartesiska ekvationer.
Grafer är utformad för att integreras väl med Gnome och använder modern hårdvara genom OpenGL.

Plots permite a fácil visualização de fórmulas matemáticas. Além das operações aritméticas básicas, suporta funções trigonométricas, hiperbólicas, exponenciais e logarítmicas, bem como somas e produtos arbitrários. Também é capaz de exibir equações polares e equações cartesianas, implícitas e explícitas.
Plots foi projetado para integrar-se bem com o ambiente GNOME e tirar proveito de hardware moderno usando OpenGL.

ul.li: Improved copy & paste compatibility with LaTeX and Unicode formulae
New tooltip text on the toolbar buttons
The formula editor now supports the Home and End keys
Tweaked the color palette for graphs
Dark mode now has a distinct color palette
Port to GTK 4 and Libadwaita, for improved performance and a cleaner look
New settings window, allowing the line thickness and quality to be customized;
Added Croatian, Farsi, Spanish and Portuguese translations;
New feature: implicit equations in x and y;
Added Czech, Hungarian, Italian, Lithuanian, Norwegian and Turkish translations.
Added support for equations of the form x = f(y);
Added support for polar equations of the forms r = f(θ) and θ = f(r);
Added support for custom logarithm bases;
Refined the grid appearance, and added grid labels;

description.p: Fix help missing in Flatpak

ul.li: Added zoom in, out and reset buttons;

description.p: Added floor and ceiling functions. Bugfixes and refactoring.
Various bugfixes and code improvements. Added missing cosech, asech, acsch, acosech and acoth functions.
Added keyboard shortcuts for undo and redo
New feature: undo/redo. Various bugfixes.
New feature: cut, copy and paste of formulae!
New feature: variables and sliders. Easily modify the parameters in your equations with just a click!
Also added a shortcut to select all the contents of a formula box, and updated the in-app documentation.
Improved the UI and added coloured graphs!
UI improvements to formula editors:

ul.li: Formula editing boxes can now scroll horizontally, and the formula pane now only scrolls vertically;
Formulae scroll to the cursor position when it moves.

Fix superscript insertion on AZERTY keyboards
Fix graph rendering on hidpi displays
Fix AppStream data
Remove sympy dependency
Initial release
